alert.note: Alert for Baraga; Dickinson; Marquette (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 30 at 7:35PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...PATCHY DENSE FOG ACROSS PORTIONS OF BARAGA, MARQUETTE, AND DICKINSON COUNTIES... ...MODERATE TO HEAVY BAND OF SNOW FALLING IN SOUTHERN BARAGA COUNTY... Local webcams show patches of dense fog in Marquette, Baraga, and Dickinson counties, particularly in the higher terrain. While visibilities are expected to improve with time as cloud ceilings lift, motorists should still exercise caution due to sharply reduced visibilities down to a quarter mile at spots. Therefore, slow down, use low-beam headlights, and allow for extra spacing between vehicles. From Watton to Three Lakes, a band of moderate to heavy snow is expected to drop around an inch in the next hour or so. Motorists should slow down in these areas as roads could be slick and visibilities could drop down to a quarter mile at times.
